messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] problems with email
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/3/02 12:30:46 AM Central Daylight Time, ... Is anyone else having problems with their email from this group and from the
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/3/02 12:30:46 AM Central Daylight Time,
leschke@... writes:


> >Ok. I'll keep mine then. I really wouldn't have needed yours as a child
> >anyway, since I never did anything that needed "sticking up for"--except
> >refuse to sing patriotic songs after the pledge of allegience in the fifth
> >grade (I can't for the life of me remember WHY I did that!).
>
> I still remember finally *getting* what the pledge was about, and then
> refusing to say it anymore. Liberty and justice for all in
> 1962? Sure! Then there was the under God part. Not me.
> Tia
>

Is anyone else having problems with their email from this group and from the
unschooling-dotcom group? I got this email from Tia twice. Once at 6:30 pm on
9/2 and then again at 12:30 am on 9/3. I also got her message from the *dress
for success* thread about earning the right to wear a beard twice. Other
problems I have been having with both lists is; I will get a reply someone
has written to someone else's post and won't get the OP till much later, and
sometimes what I post won't show up for hours, or ever.
I hope this is just a fluke! <g>
~Nancy


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
